New Review of Zuba's Durand Translation

27 Apr 2018

A new review has been published of Elizabeth Zuba’s recent translation of Anouck Durand’s “Eternal Friendship.” Read the review in the Santa Fe New Mexican.

Elizabeth is also the author of the magnificent Decoherent The Wing’ed (SLT, 2016).

Catherine Meng is reading in Denver on April 29, 2017

31 Mar 2017

Catherine Meng, author of The Longest Total Solar Eclipse of the Century will be reading in Denver on April 29, 2017 7-10 pm at the Leon gallery in Denver. She will be joining Paula Cisewski, Taryn Schwilling, and Brian Laidlaw on guitar.

If you’re in the area, please attend!

Mayer's Desires Reviewed in Publisher's Weekly

25 Mar 2017

Publisher’s Weekly has given the SplitLevel/Nightboat joint re-publication of Bernadette Mayer’s Desires of Mothers a nice, starred review.

It’s good to see this book back in the world.

You can purchase Desires of Mothers from our friends at Small Press Distribution.

SplitLevel Texts Announces New Website

02 Aug 2013

After a couple months of downtime, we’re very excited to announce our new website!

Please have a look around the site and be sure to stay tuned for our upcoming releases from Catherine Meng and Carla Harryman.
